medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric pain radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started 1 week ago and has progressively worsened. Patient has experienced nausea without vomiting during this period. No changes in bowel habits or unusual stools.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Alcohol abuse, hypertension (HTN), gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD).
medical_history.family_history: No family history of pancreatic problems or malignancy. Parents believed to be healthy.
medical_history.social_history: Patient consumes approximately 24 oz of alcohol per day and denies recent hard alcohol consumption.
